channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 00:32 Air alert in Donetsk region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 🔴 00:32 Air alert in Donetsk region. Follow for further updates. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 00:23 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Myriv territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community
item.description: 🟡 00:23 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. item.title: 🔴 22:02 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Chervonogrigorivsk territorial community. Take shelter!
